title: malaventura - miniLP01
description:
minilp01 
Limited edition of 13 miniCDs-polaroids, numbered with special envelope (2013)


6 tracks, 25 minutes of electronic music that blend  electro, ambient, lowfi & chiptune sounds with a mid-tempo stuttering weirdo funk. These songs are only available via this exclusive and ultra-limited mini-CD edition.. Just 13 copies were made and only 12 are in public auction. No digital copy of this album will be made or uploaded by me on the net.
